title: Gel Packs Direct - Multipurpose Reusable 3-in-1 Hot & Cold Ice Pack with Strap for Shoulder, Elbow, Knee, Ankle. & More. Treats Sports Injuries, Chronic Pain, Joint Stiffness, Swelling, Pain & More.
features: VERSATILE USE - Our multipurpose Ice Gel Pack Kit is designed to be your one-stop solution for a wide variety of sports injuries, aches, pains, swelling, joint stiffness & more. Whether you're experiencing issues with your knee, ankle, elbow, shoulder, back, hip or any other body part, our Instant Ice Pack is adjustable up to a 44” waist, for fuss-free application and effective relief.

USE HOT OR COLD - Our 3-in-1 reusable Ice Packs for Injuries can be used either hot or cold depending on your own unique needs. Simply heat in the microwave and use as a heat pack to improve blood flow and promote healing, or take out of the freezer to use as a cold pack (cold compress) to reduce inflammation, swelling and bruising.

FLEXIBLE & HANDS-FREE - Frost-free and 100% leak-proof, our ice pack for injuries remains flexible even when frozen and features an adjustable strap that wraps comfortably around any body part - providing targeted relief for a wide range of conditions, from acute injuries to chronic pain.

LONG LASTING RELIEF - This icepack for injuries stays cold for longer and comes with a flexible gel pack (27x14cm), compress wrap & cover (28x15cm), strap (65x10cm) and non-woven sleeve (28x15cm). Our gel ice pack is a fast and effective method of relief for sprains, strains and sports recovery.

GELPACKS DIRECT - With more than a decade at the forefront of sports injury therapy and treatment, our products have been developed to a professional grade and are recommended by physical therapists and athletes alike. Not only effective, our products are also sustainably packaged and provide unrivalled durability.
description: From the brand Previous page Our Bestselling Ice Packs Visit the store How we get our start? Whilst training for his first marathon, our Founder, Mark was struggling with over-use injuries and without a suitable product to help. From this was born GelpacksDirect. What makes our products unique? Over the years we have fine-tuned our gel packs to be the best on the market today. Flexible when frozen and a safe operating temperature when used hot or cold. Why we love what we do? We all help each other to push forward towards our individual goals, whether that be patching someone up to run their first couch to 5k or ticking an ultra-marathon off their bucket-list! Next page
